How do I get started?

Simply add your images to the drop zone to get started blending! JPG, PNG, PDF, and many other popular image formats are supported.

Can I edit my images before blending?

Yes! Head over to our image editor to do so. You can even edit images you've already blended, and blend those again! The possibilities are endless...
